description.narrative: UNICEF completed a Public Finance for Children study, an important tool for further advocacy for increased spending in social areas. Furthermore, advocacy led to the release of the 2015 census data for secondary analysis and for a commitment by the government to do a combined EDS/MICS study in 2019. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2019
